name: James Burton's Tic Tac Toe
description:
A classic game of Tic Tac Toe! This game allows for User vs Computer, Local Multiplayer, LAN Multiplayer, and Online Multiplayer. Online Multiplayer requires you to connect with a friend, with the "Host" requiring to portforward the port "8049" and giving your friend your external ip.  There are 18 colors to choose from and supports fullscreen. There is also a hardmode color for an extra challenge if you'd like. The computer has 3 levels of difficulty which build on its playing style.

Originally made for the GDU Jam 4, this was my first attempt at learning networking with Gamemaker: Studios. It is very basic, though if I ever come back to this, I will likely add more games like roshambo, mancala, draughts, and 3 men's morris.

CONTROLS:
[WS]: Navigate
[Space/Enter]: Confirm Selection
[Esc]: Exit game to Titlescreen
(Mouse Left Click): Select a space to place an X/O; Edit the IP text field on the title screen
